alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 6:58PM PST until January 19 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Portions of I-90 will be impacted by snow and ice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation has ended tonight but untreated roadways and sidewalks could remain slippery.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
